name.baseName: Recycled rubber ; Gum powder, waste tire ; Grinding - atmospheric pressure continuous desulfurization - refining ; All sizes; NESPS2
再生橡胶 ; 胶粉，废轮胎 ; 磨粉-常压连续脱硫-精炼 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 废轮胎再生橡胶胶粉通过常压连续脱硫和后续精炼处理，适用于各种尺寸的橡胶产品，主要用于需要再生橡胶作为原料的橡胶制品生产。数据集还包含排气气体和颗粒物排放（PM2.5 - PM10）的末端治理技术，使用袋式过滤器进行管理，以及采用光催化+低温等离子体、吸附/催化燃烧和热燃烧+水喷雾方法处理挥发性有机化合物（VOCs），这些都是针对工业污染处理系统的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码29,四级代码2914文件，在完整版文件中第3277页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management96，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为96，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisThermal combustion + water spray，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprise (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物①的末端治理技术是热力燃烧+水喷淋，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物①

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAdsorption/catalytic combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物①的末端治理技术是吸附/催化燃烧法，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物①

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisPhotocatalysis + low temperature plasma，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标挥发性有机物①的末端治理技术是光催化+低温等离子体，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物①
源文件中描述为为再生橡胶，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / annual normal production time of enterprises (hours)
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
